title: Sivir's Spellshield
body:
I recently played a game with Sivir, and several times my spellshield didn't proc when thought it should have.

The first one that I thought it should have proced was when standing on Morgana's Tormented Soil. Does it not proc from AOE's any more?

Second was Miss Fortune's Ult. Sure, I was standing in the area, but couldn't it at least block one wave of damage? Even if it didn't block damage, my spellshield didn't proc to begin with.

Third is Gangplank's Parrrley. This is probably the shakiest one for me. Shouldn't it proc from the projectile?

If this is a glitch, it goes without saying this should be looked into and fixed. If this was intentional, Riot, can someone change the description of spellshield so we know what it can block?

replies.body:
For the first two, those are both constant AoE damage things; Spellshields do not block those.

For the third, it could be Riot finally made Gangplank's Parrrley (which for all intents is a melee autoattack with a higher base damage) finally not stop at spellshields. Or your timing was off. Or it actually was a bug.
the only one it should've blocked was GP's PARRLEY.
